main event: A UFO sighting in Sacramento, California on August 3, 1952, involving the observation of a large rod-shaped object at an altitude of 3000-4000 feet.
interesting points: The witness reported seeing three orange-colored objects at a high altitude and traveling at a fast speed in a V formation.
The witness was a part of the aircraft warning service and was returning from a late movie when the sighting occurred.
The object was observed to arch upward and was described as having a crimson flame or yellowish red color.
The witness observed oscillation in the direction of the objects, which then faded out and disappeared.
The sighting was also reported to the Air Technical Intelligence Center and the Air Force Office of Special Investigations.
result: The report lacks a definitive explanation for the sightings, leaving the object's nature unidentified.
sighted object: Large rod-shaped object resembling a flare, three orange-colored objects
photographs: No photographs included in the report
